attributes.action: Tell us how many people would have to sign a petition to scrap speed cameras before he would actually do it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many people would have to sign a petition to scrap speed cameras before the prime minister would actually do it?

We don't want some hype in reply about saving lives.

Go on...put a figure on it!

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
